rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a glass facade to maximize natural light while adhering to Vastu principles. The entrance is aligned towards the east for auspicious energy flow.
An expansive art deco living room featuring geometric patterns, rich textures, and integrated seating areas. Windows are placed on the south wall to allow ample sunlight per Vastu guidelines.

A spacious dining area adjacent to the living room with large windows for natural light. The layout ensures the kitchen is visible from the dining area for safety and ease of access as per traditional practices.

The kitchen is designed in an open plan layout, featuring modern appliances integrated into art deco design elements, ensuring efficient workflow and ventilation on the east or north side to maintain positive energy flow.
A full bathroom dedicated for guests with sufficient space, natural light through windows on the south wall, and fixtures placed according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: The main entrance door is aligned towards the east to invite positive energy. It features a double glazed glass panel above to allow natural light while maintaining privacy.
A secondary entrance for service personnel ensuring ease of access and adherence to safety regulations without disrupting the flow of positive energy.
